event.title: intense real estate development and several luxury buildings are now

data.event: Vila Velha has been through several years of intense real estate development and several luxury buildings are now a common sight in all of its main beaches.

event.title: was founded as Vila do Espírito Santo ("Village of the Holy Spirit") on 23 May 1535

data.event: It was founded as Vila do Espírito Santo ("Village of the Holy Spirit") on 23 May 1535 by Vasco Fernandes Coutinho, the first captain of Espírito Santo.

event.title: remained a quiet town until quite recently; the 1828

data.event: Afterward, Vila Velha remained a quiet town until quite recently; the 1828 census, for example, showed only 1,250 people in the town.
